response.original_title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game Duel Master's Guide
response.overview: In ancient Egypt there existed a force so powerful, it had be locked away for a millennia. Now one boy has released the power! It's time to duel!  DVD Features:  Chapter 1  Prologue.  Chapter 2 Preparation. Chapter 3 Card details  Chapter. 4  Phases of gameplay.  Chapter 5  Battle & damage. Chapter 6  Sample duel. Chapter 7  More details & epilogue
response.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game Duel Master's Guide
